purpose.description: SatyaCheck's accessibility service is used solely to provide user-requested analysis of on-screen text to detect potential misinformation. The service is never used to monitor user behavior, bypass system security, or access sensitive information.

user-controls.control: Service is only enabled with explicit user consent through Settings
Analysis only occurs when user explicitly presses the "Analyze" button
Service can be disabled by user at any time
Clear in-app explanations of what the service does and doesn't do

privacy-protection.practice: No content is stored or transmitted without explicit user consent
Only the specific content the user selects is analyzed
No monitoring of user behavior or screen content
No collection of passwords, personal data, or sensitive information

policy-alignment.commitment: Service never automates user interactions without consent
Service never accesses content from other apps without user action
Service never collects data in the background
Service is never used for unauthorized data collection
